about.title: ABOUT
about.description: "Everyone in this country should learn to program".
about.content:
Hello, how is it going? My name is Wesin Alves, I have a degree in Computer Engineering from the Federal University of Pará (2007) and a Master's degree in Electrical Engineering from the Federal University of Pará (2011). I am currently a student of the PhD course of the Graduate Program in Electrical Engineering - Federal University of Pará. I have experience in the area of Software Development for Web and Computational Intelligence, working mainly in the following topics: Machine Learning, Data Mining, Artificial Neural Networks, Atypical Detection, Reinforcement Learning, PHP, Java, PostgreSql, Mysql and UML.

I have a fairly solid background in the area of computing covering several areas, but the focus of my activities over the years has been web development. I have been a developer in several state government agencies where I have always worked in this area. I have a dream of helping people connect through a digital initiative because I believe that the connected world is a better world.

I agree with one of the phrases that Steve Jobs, one of the great digital innovators of the world, said: "Everyone in this country should learn how to program".

hireme.title: HIRE ME
hireme.description: Everyone needs to connect to the internet.
hireme.content:
You can hire me to create your brand, website, system, visual identity, image editing, video creation, vignettes, intros, promotions, photo essays, product and business photography.

I am available for remote jobs in freelance or home-office projects. I am also available for travel.

In freelance projects, I work such with a fixed amount per hour that per project. Feel free to contact me and ask questions about the process we use to develop our work or talk about an employment opportunity.
